changelogversion.changelogtext: Added a recipes section with print and share functions
Added a Viewpager to dash screens so you can now scroll left and right on the main pages
Added Overlapping Panels Navigation with left and right panels. You can open them by scrolling or using the toolbar icons
Added Keep Warm option toggle and settings. Requires PiFire v1.2.7 or later
Added Grill Startup Time Setting. Requires PiFire v1.2.7 or later
Added PiFire modules information to info page
Moved to OneSignal Push Notifications. Requires PiFire Server v1.2.7 or later
Replaced most Snackbars with Alerter's for better visibility
Various UI improvements including expandable views in the Pellets section
Backend WebSocket overhaul to improve functions and receive responses from PiFire. Backward compatibility is present for PiFire versions below 1.2.7
Firebase Notifications were removed to support OneSignal. If you have a PiFire server version below 1.2.7 push notifications will not work
Fixed issue where reinstalling would break basic auth username and password decryption. If the app is removed these preferences will not be backed up and will need to be reentered after installation
Added Celsius Support. Setting can be found in probe settings section or can be changed in PiFire
Added PID Center Ratio to Work Settings
Added Server Backup and Restore to Admin section
Moved Crash Reporting to Sentry
Misc Fixes
Some functions require PiFire v1.2.2 or later
Added Manual Controls to Admin section
Added a Fast Scroll Option to Temp Selectors. This should help in scrolling to desired temp faster
Added More Temp Selections to Temp Selections
Updated self signed certificate implementation. This will allow self signed certificates that are imported to the Android certificate store
Misc Fixes
Added Temp Shutdown to Temp Selectors along with a visual flag to indicate it is active
Added Time Shutdown to Time Selector along with a visual flag to indicate it is active
Added Pellet Level Check function. Just press the pellet level box on the dashboard or the refresh button on the pellets page
Added option to delete individual pellet logs. Just long press and a dialog will show
Added low pellet warning notifications. With this you can receive notifications if pellet levels go below a set threshold during a cook
Added a Keep Screen on function. This will force the screen to remain on when viewing the dashboard. This was it will not timeout and turn off. Be careful as this can drain battery
Begin adding landscape tablet layout for dashboard, pellet manager, history and info
Update Timer Operation to be more reliable and run locally. This allows a minute/seconds countdown without the server needing to send updates continuously
Lowered the minimum api to 24. This should help support some older tablets
Updated Firebase notifications
Misc other bugfixes
